thread.title: TV | Better Off Abroad

author: Fiona Flynn
title: TV | Better Off Abroad
text: After George Lee's brief flirtation with politics, he is safely back in the arms of RTE at this stage and back on our telly boxes once more. He presents the first of two programmes tonight about Irish people living abroad, where Lee travels to Dubai to talk to ex-pats about what led them to move to a city in the middle of a desert, with over 8000 Irish people living there. Eh, we reckon it might be something to do with it being a tax free haven but what do we know. The Irish in Dubai overall seem to be thriving but does the lifestyle comes a hefty price tag?
